resources.string: " Dice: To throw the dice touch the image"
Coin: To throw the coin touch the image
Victory points: To mark the victory of a duel, touch the point and its color will change
Restart Duel: To restart the duel, touch the button, this will leave the life points of both players at 8000
Restart Match: To restart the duel, touch the button, this will leave the life points of both players at 8000 and will uncheck all the marked victory points
